ERROR_EMPTY_DATA: Kuskure: Bayani mara amfani wanda aka bayar
ERROR_INVALID_DATA: Kuskure: Bayani mara inganci da aka bayar
ERROR_COLUMNA_NO_EXISTE: Shafi {{} 'ba ya wanzu a cikin dataframe
error_type: Shigar dole ne ta nau'in kirtani.
not_found: Babu wani aiki mai suna "{sunan}" an samo shi. \ N \ Naviilable Zaɓuɓɓuka sune: \ n \ n {zaba}
call:
Kira (Suna, nau'in = Babu Babu, Hanyar = Babu Wani lokaci
Bincike don fayil ɗin da suna (kuma nau'in zaɓi) a cikin fayil ɗin da aka bayar (ko daga CWD) ƙasa don haka sama,
Kuma kaya yana dogaro da nau'in sa ta atomatik.

Sigogi:
    Suna (str): Sunan fayil na fayil ɗin, ba tare da tsayawa ba.
    Nau'in (str, na zaɓi): Sihiri da ake tsammanin ('CSV', 'XML').
    Hanya (str, na zaɓi): Hanyar farko don bincika daga.
    Awimout (Int, zaɓi): Matsakaicin lokacin bincike a cikin sakan.
    Takaitaccen (BOL, na zaɓi): IF gaskiya, ta haifar da kuskuren da idan an samo fayiloli da yawa tare da ana samun sunan iri ɗaya.

Komawa: abun ciki na fayil ɗin da aka samo ko babu.
load_user_translations:
Load_user_transations (Lang_path = "Lang.json")
Loads masu amfani da fassarorin mai amfani daga fayil na JSS kuma haɗa su da tsoffin fassarorin.

Sigogi:
    Lang_path (str, na zaɓi): hanya zuwa fayil ɗin fassarar mai amfani. Predefinicións "Lang.json".

Halin:
    - Idan fayil ɗin ya wanzu kuma yana da inganci JONS, ya haɗa da abin da ya ƙunsa tare da tsoho fassarar
    - Idan fayil ɗin bai wanzu ba, yana kiyaye tsohuwar fassarar
    - Nuna wani lokacin gargadi idan fayil ɗin ya wanzu amma ba za a iya ɗaukar kaya ba
    - Saukake da Dictionary Dictionary

SAURARA: Dole ne a kira wannan aikin kafin amfani da aikin T () don fassarar mai amfani don aiwatarwa.
switch:
Ingantaccen tsarin Canjin don Python. Yana goyan baya:
- Maɓallan daidaitawa da yawa a kowane yanayi
- Wasanni ta darajar, nau'in, regex, lambda aiki, ko aji
- Pandas da lambobi tsarin tallafi
- Kashe na Zabi na Zabi na Karshe
- daidaita-duka-duka don aiwatar da mahimman lokuta masu dacewa
- Yanayin Debug don shiga lokuta masu dacewa
async_switch:
Worlpper da nan da nan da nan da atisaye a yanayin Async. Sigogi:
- Darajar: darajar don dacewa da abubuwan da aka ayyana.
- ** KWARGS: Muhimminanan keywords na zaɓi ya wuce kai tsaye zuwa canjin canzawa. Waɗannan na iya haɗawa da:
  - Match_all (BOOL): Kashe duk lokuta masu dacewa maimakon tsayawa a farkon.
  - Debug (bool): buga wane yanayi ya dace da abin da aka kashe.
  - Asynnnc_mode (bool): bai kamata a wuce da hannu anan ba (koyaushe ana tilasta masa gaskiya).
Misali: Asyncswitch ('Sannu', Match_all = Gaskiya ne, Debug = Gaskiya) (...)
encoding_error: Kuskuren fayil ɗin fayil (ba UTF-8 ba)
provide_file_path: Da fatan za a samar da hanyar fayil don bincika
file_not_found_any: Babu fayil mai suna '{sunan}' wanda aka samo a '{hanya}
file_ambiguous: Sunan da yawa da aka mai suna '{sunan} an samo: {nau'ikan}. Saka nau'in ko amfani da tsayayye = arya.
unsupported_file_type: Inpuported Fayil ɗin da aka karɓa: {Extre}
t: Ya dawo da rubutun da aka karkatar don maɓallin da aka bayar dangane da zaɓaɓɓen yaren da aka zaɓa.
show_gui_popup_description:
Nuna wani bututun da ke ciki tare da abun cikin rubutu da kuma hangen nesa na zaɓi.
Yanayin biyu biyu da kuma tsarin rubutu na Jupyter.

Fasali:
- Copy / Ajiye canje-canje dangane da shafin aiki
- ingantaccen adadi a cikin jupyter
- Tsabtace Takaitaccen Wurin taga

Args:
    Take (Str): taken taga
    abun ciki (str): Rubutun rubutu don nunawa
    Fig
    makir_fuwar (kalami, na zabi): aiki ne wanda ke samar da adadi
    PLAMS_ARGS (DOLT, Zabi): muhawara don pold_function
load_user_translations_error: Ba zai iya ɗaukar mai amfani lang.json: {kuskure}
redundant_true: Kwatancen kwatantawa da gaskiya, yi amfani da darajar kai tsaye
redundant_false: Kwatantawa da kwatantawa da karya, yi amfani da 'ba' maimakon
none_comparison: Kwatantawa da babu wanda ya kamata ya yi amfani da 'shine' maimakon '=='
not_true_recommendation: Amfani da '! = Gaskiya' ba a ba da shawarar ba, yi la'akari da sauƙin sauƙaƙe yanayin
not_false_recommendation: Yin amfani da '! = Arya' ba a bada shawarar ba, la'akari da amfani da yanayin ingantacce
help_usage: Yi amfani da taimako ('aiki_name') don cikakkun bayanai game da takamaiman aiki
help_error: Kuskure: Aiki '{}' ba ya wanzu ko ba shi da takardu
async_preview_not_available:
Misali na Asyn ba za a iya nuna a cikin samfoti na Sync ba.
Yi amfani da 'jira Asyncswitch (...)' a cikin yanayin AsynC.
scatter_description: Haifar da wani shiri na watsar don hango alaƙar da ke tsakanin masu canjin biyu.
lineplot_description: Airƙiri tsarin layin layi mai mahimmanci don jerin lokuta ko bayanan da aka yi oda.
kdeplot_description: Haifar da tari na tarihi yana amfani da kimar kernel.
violinplot_description: Yana nuna rarraba bayanai a cikin nau'ikan da yawa.
pairplot_description: Yana ƙirƙirar dangantaka da alaƙa da bayanai a cikin bayanan da ke nuna haɗin gwiwa da rarraba abubuwan baƙin ciki.
countplot_description: Shirye-shiryen mashaya wanda ke nuna yawan bayanan rarrabuwa.
lmplot_description: Mataimakin bayanai da tsarin karkara mai zurfi sun dace da tsinkaye.
jointplot_description: Haɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗaɗɗen maƙarƙashiya tare da tarihin ƙwayoyin cuta ko kuma makircin Kde akan rijiyoyin.
swarmplot_description: Yana nuna duk abubuwan lura tare da wakilcin rarraba na ƙarshe.
regplot_description: Mataimakin bayanai da kuma tsarin sikilai ya dace da umarnin polynomial na zaɓi.
barplot_description: Yana nuna ma'ana game da kimantawa da kuma tsayayyen tsaka-tsaki azaman mai kusurwa mai kusurwa.
stripplot_description: A wani yanki mai watsa wanda ke canzawa inda yake da bambanci tare da Jitter don guje wa ya shafa.
large_plot_note: SAURARA: Wannan makircin na iya ɗaukar ɗan lokaci don ya ƙarfafa saboda girman sa
preview_not_available: Ba a tsara samfoti na wannan aikin ba
get_moda_description: Yana lissafta yanayin (mafi yawan ƙimar sauƙaƙe) na bayanan. Na iya dawo da darajar tare da ƙididdigar mita.
get_media_description: Yana lissafta ma'anar lissafi (matsakaita) na bayanan. Nan dabi'un Nan dabi'u na zaɓi.
get_median_description: Yana lissafta Median (darajar tsakiya) na bayanai. Nan dabi'un Nan dabi'u na zaɓi.
get_rank_description: Yana lissafta kewayon (bambanci tsakanin max da min) na shafi na bayanai.
get_var_description: Yana lissafta bambancin shafi na DataFrame.
get_desv_description: Yana lissafta daidaitattun tsarin shafi na bayanai.
disp_description: Ya dawo da matakan watsawa (Range, Bambanci, Matsakaici Matsayi) Don shafin zane-zane.
call_description: Bincike don karanta fayilolin nau'ikan tsari daban-daban (CSV, JSSP, XML) tare da zaɓuɓɓukan bincike mai sassauƙa.
check_syntax_description: Analyzes Python code for syntax errors, undefined names, and style issues.
createDB_description: Factory function to create a database connection instance.
exportData_description: Exports data from database tables to various formats (CSV, JSON, XML, SQL, Excel, etc.).
addTable_description: Adds a new table to the database with specified columns and constraints.
mergeTable_description: Merges multiple tables using SQL logic with different join types.
join_description: Performs SQL joins between tables with various join types.
drop_description: Drops tables from the database, optionally with cascade.
cascadeDelete_description: Performs cascade deletion based on a condition, handling dependencies.
recursiveQuery_description: Executes recursive queries using Common Table Expressions (CTE).
windowFunction_description: Applies window functions (ROW_NUMBER, RANK, etc.) to table data.
executeRawSQL_description: Executes raw SQL queries directly on the database.
show_description: Displays database tables and data in a graphical interface.
hbar_description: Creates a horizontal bar chart with customizable labels and colors.
vbar_description: Creates a vertical bar chart with customizable labels and colors.
pie_description: Creates a pie chart with customizable labels, colors, and percentage formatting.
boxplot_description: Creates a box plot to visualize distribution of data across categories.
histo_description: Creates a histogram to visualize distribution of a numeric variable.
heatmap_description: Creates a heatmap to visualize matrix-like data with color coding.
table_description: Creates a table visualization from data arrays or DataFrames.
normalize_description: Normalizes an array between 0 and 1 using min-max scaling.
conditional_description: Applies logical conditions to generate a new column in a DataFrame.
convert_file_description: Converts files between different formats (SHP, DBF, XML, etc.) to CSV.
Switch_description: Synchronous switch implementation with multiple pattern matching formats.
switch_description: Wrapper function for natural syntax usage of the synchronous switch.
AsyncSwitch_description: Asynchronous switch implementation with multiple pattern matching formats.
async_switch_description: Wrapper function for natural syntax usage of the asynchronous switch.
config_description: Global configuration dictionary for module settings.
fig_to_img_description: Converts a matplotlib figure to an image array for use in other visualizations.
format_number_description: Formats numbers with customizable decimal places and percentage formatting.
load_user_translations_description: Loads user-defined translation files to extend or override default translations.
register_description: Decorator to register functions or classes in the global REGISTRY.
set_language_description: Sets the current language for translations.
t_description: Translation function that returns the translated string for a given key in the current language.
